author: nevermore_evermore
content: Can I have a question? What is the distinction between Ethereum's planned PoS and Ouroboros PoS protocol?

author: nevermore_evermore

author: sky.cactus
content: This is not the correct place to ask.  There isn't a great place to ask for comparisons in general because a good answer requires someone who is an expert in both systems and there are very few such people.  You can try Reddit.  ðŸ¤·

author: mandrigin
content:
Hey, I just noticed that Nimbus normalizes web3 endpoint URL
e.g. I have url https://gateway.fm/ethereum/mainnet?apiKey=AaAaAa and nimbus actually requests https://gateway.fm/ethereum/mainnet?apiKey=aaaaaa
that doesn't work if the api key is case-sensitive? Is there any way around that?

author: ajsutton
content: This isn't really the right place to ask user support questions, the server is focussed on Ethereum R&D.  I'd suggest logging a bug with Nimbus on that one - URL paths and query params are case sensitive.
